title: Panton Incorporated Announces the Addition of Bill Lane, Vice President of Sales
text:
Panton Incorporated Announces the Addition of Bill Lane, Vice President of Sales [October 09, 2015] Tweet 
Panton Incorporated, a leader in search-oriented business process technology, today announced the appointment of Bill Lane to the role of Vice President, Sales. 
"Having Bill join Panton is significant as he brings more than 30 years of direct experience and adds strong leadership that will drive our growth," said Frank Li, President and CEO of Panton Inc. "With his expertise and knowledge, he will make an immediate impact in the midstream technology market." 
Mr. Lane comes to Panton from Quorum Business Solutions where he served as Managing Director of Sales for more than 10 years. Mr. Lane began his career in oil and gas accounting, having worked for companies with utility, trading and midstream operations. Subsequently, Mr. Lane worked for energy software solution providers where he developed strong relationships with executives and business leaders at numerous energy companies in Norh America and abroad. 
"I am excited to be part of something exceptional. The Panton platform and the lightning speed at which it performs is unlike any other I have seen in my career," said Lane. "I look forward to working with a remarkably talented team while leveraging my expertise to expand the use of Panton within the midstream sector and beyond." 
About Panton Incorporated 
Panton is a search-oriented information technology platform, which connects all available sources of data to provide a universal business platform. 
With deep knowledge and experience with business intelligence in the energy industry, Panton effectively handles big data and functions across - transaction management, contract administration, plant settlement, gathering and nominations, daily volume and value allocations, condensate stabilization, procurement management, supply-chain management, invoicing, forecasting, risk management and a universal reporting framework - essentially all aspects of midstream business process. 
For more information about Panton Incorporated, please visit www.pantoninc.com . View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20151009005098/en/
